cardText: Display comment count on card tiles
description: Show how many comments exist for each card directly on the board so we can prioritize cards with active discussion.
plan:
1) Extend Supabase query to return comment counts per card (e.g., via RPC or denormalized column)
2) Update types and state to store counts
3) Render a badge on each card tile with the number of comments
4) Add tests verifying count rendering and fallback states

checklist.label: Add comment count field to card fetch
